arts.ttl: Eddie Howe has ‘unfortunate’ news about late striker signing ahead of the visit of Wolves
arts.sum: However, he suffered a physical blow at Elland Road, which will rule him out of the running for a full home debut at St. James' Park . So his ankle swelled up at halftime meant he had to come off and unfortunately I think he'll be missing until the next international break.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe reflects on the challenges of the campaign ahead of the visit of Wolves
arts.sum: And that's why the last two weeks has been good because we've been able to get work into players that needed it. With the window shut, Howe has focused on working with the players as he likes to do the most.

arts.ttl: £35m Newcastle United star at risk of missing Wolves as well as Yoane Wissa and Jacob Ramsey
arts.sum: Speaking in a pre-match press conference ahead of Wolves vs Newcastle, Eddie Howe has provided updates on his midfield options. Eddie Howe unsure about Bruno Guimaraes for Newcastle after international break

arts.ttl: Vitor Pereira Newcastle United press conference – Talks about missing Jorgen Strand Larsen and failed transfer
arts.sum: The Vitor Pereira Newcastle United press conference has taken place. The Wolves boss talking to journalists ahead of Saturday afternoon’s match. Vitor Pereira saw his Wolves side lose 3-0 at... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Wolves handed timely boost as £50m Newcastle star set to miss Premier League fixture
arts.sum: Wolves have been handed a boost ahead of their Saturday afternoon fixture against Newcastle United with a £50 million player set to miss the game. In his pre-Wolves press conference, Eddie Howe confirmed that Wissa will be unavailable to play against Vitor Pereira’s team.

arts.ttl: Pereira reveals whether Wolves forward Strand Larsen will play against former admirers Newcastle
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers head coach Vitor Pereira reveals whether Jorgen Strand Larsen will play against former admirers Newcastle United on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton thinks one Wolves player could dampen the mood against Newcastle United
arts.sum: Making his weekend predictions for BBC Sport, Sutton writes: “We will have to wait and see how fit and ready Nick Woltemade and Yoane Wissa are, or how they settle in, but I still think Newcastle will have too much for a Wolves team who are leaking too many goals.” It’s almost time for Premier League action to resume after the international break, and former player Chris Sutton has named his player to watch in Wolves vs Newcastle.

arts.ttl: Newcastle vs. Wolves injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the injury and suspension news ahead of Newcastle's clash with Wolves in the Premier League on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Paul Merson brutally predicts Newcastle United to batter Wolves this weekend
arts.sum: Yoane Wissa and Nick Woltemade are both in contention for Newcastle, and no matter if one or both play, Paul Merson believes only one result can happen. Wolves fans will not like what Paul Merson has predicted for the game against Newcastle, as he has given the Old Gold no chance of getting a result.

arts.ttl: Jorgen Strand Larsen injury worse than first feared as Wolves give training update
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira has said that Jorgen Strand Larsen's injury is worse than initially feared, and the Norwegian is not available vs Newcastle.
